⚡ QUICK FIXES TO TRY FIRST
══════════════════════════════════════════════

BUTTON - Re-pairing:
1. Remove device from Homey
2. Factory reset: Hold button 5s until LED blinks rapidly
3. Add device → Universal Tuya Zigbee app
4. Search "button" or "switch"
5. Stay within 2m during pairing
6. Choose correct driver:
   • 1 button → "Wireless Switch (1-Gang, Battery)"
   • 2 buttons → "Wireless Switch (2-Gang, Battery)"
   • 4 buttons → "Wireless Switch (4-Gang, Battery)"

MOTION SENSOR - IAS Zone Enrollment:
1. Remove device from Homey
2. Factory reset:
   • Remove battery, wait 10s
   • Reinsert battery
   • Hold reset button 5s
3. Add device → Universal Tuya Zigbee app
4. Search "motion"
5. ⚠️ IMPORTANT: Stay within 2m, wait 60 seconds for IAS Zone enrollment
6. Choose correct driver:
   • PIR sensor → "Motion Sensor (Battery)"
   • PIR + temp/humid → "Motion Sensor + Temp/Humid (Battery)"
   • mmWave radar → "Motion Sensor mmWave (Battery)"

TS0601 DEVICES:
If your devices are model TS0601 (check Zigbee info), v3.0.35 fixed initialization issues. Re-pair them after the update.
